docs.title: Endless Simple Idle Game using React
docs.text: This app is an endless idle game written in JavaScript using React templates. You earn points when you click on the button. Try it on CodeSandbox

docs.title: Running The App
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Run npm install to install dependencies.
  3. Run npm start to start the server.
  4. Open localhost:3000 on your browser.

docs.title: Running Unit Tests
docs.text: Run npm run test to run unit tests after installing dependencies.

docs.title: Building The App
docs.text: Run npm run build to build the app for production mode and generates the build folder with minified code.
